turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get me a couple drinks from the SB near our office?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, the one in Otay Ranch yeah?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's the one!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cool, what can I get you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well we're having a breakfast meeting. So coffee and maybe some pastries

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many people will be attending?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think six are confirmed, but order for nine just in case

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So I should over order on both drinks and pastries?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't think everyone will eat so just get six pastries, but yes get more than six drinks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Black coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. All of us drink black, just make sure to get cream and sugar on the side

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok noted on that. Any particular for the pastries

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just get a regular assortment, whatever is available

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So muffins, scones, cookies and the like, got it

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yup that's right. Also can you see if they have a breakfast meal discount

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll check but to the best of ny knowledge, they don't

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, it's alright if there isn't. Just no harm in trying

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: True. So to confirm a breakfast setup for six but ordering for 9

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that's correct. Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it! You're welcome
